Name: country
Description: Shortcut for country - defaults to country.name

Name: country.id
Description: Id for country used by ReliefWeb

Name: country.primary
Description: Flag to indicate this is the primary country

Name: country.shortname
Description: Short name of country where applicable, for example 'Syria' for 'Syrian Arab Republic'

Name: date
Description: Shortcut for date - defaults to date.created

Name: description
Description: Description of the disaster in Markdown format

Name: description-html
Description: Description of the disaster in HTML format

Name: featured
Description: Flag to indicate if the disaster is featured on ReliefWeb home page

Name: glide
Description: Global IDEntifier number (GLIDE) of the disaster

Name: id
Description: Unique id of disaster used by ReliefWeb

Name: primary_country
Description: Shortcut for primary country - defaults to primary_country.name

Name: primary_country.id
Description: Id of primary country used by ReliefWeb

Name: primary_country.shortname
Description: Short name of country where applicable, for example 'Syria' for 'Syrian Arab Republic'

Name: primary_type
Description: Shortcut for primary disaster type - defaults to primary_type.name

Name: primary_type.id
Description: Id for primary disaster type used by ReliefWeb

Name: profile.overview
Description: Profile of the country in Markdown format

Name: profile.overview-html
Description: Profile of the country in HTML format

Name: profile.key_content.active
Description: Array of links for current key content for the country

Name: profile.key_content.archive
Description: Array of links for archive key content for the country

Name: profile.appeals_response_plans
Description: Appeals and Response Plans for this country

Name: profile.appeals_response_plans.active
Description: Array of links for current appeals and plans

Name: profile.appeals_response_plans.archive
Description: Array of links for archive appeals and plans

Name: type
Description: Shortcut for disaster type - defaults to type.name

Name: type.id
Description: Id of disaster type used by ReliefWeb

Name: type.primary
Description: Whether disaster type is primary or not
